snippet: Often lost in the euphoria of confetti blizzards and champagne showers of an NBA Finals triumph is the crushing despair just down the hall....
lead_paragraph: Often lost in the euphoria of confetti blizzards and champagne showers of an NBA Finals triumph is the crushing despair just down the hall.

headline.main: In the NBA Finals, the Losses Linger More Than the Wins
headline.print_headline: In the NBA Finals, the Losses Linger More Than the Wins
